body: Kek typical NTR trope, trash plot and all the characteristic of the participants are thrown right out the window.
I did my research. Zokumonogatari, C90(Loli trio H), C91(Loli Combi Ecchi cat x vamp) and the untranslated Yumemonogatari are NTR-free. It was harrowing finding them😭😭
Por araragi but its bretrayed shinobu with senjougahara hanekawa kanbaru ononoki, mayoi hachikuji, sisters etc

It's funny looking back at these old comments, because people get mad over something that's not canon and somehow argue about it. Plus if you can acknowledge the fact that it isn't canon it's easier to fap to.
Welp, is kinda 1.1 lv up for NTR v:
@Biribiri How is speaking the truth demonizing? All you guys want is to self-insert into Araragi and by the way I don't even like NTR
@Herrscher, can't agree with you there. Simply because I know that you're just demonizing him to justify your fapping to this.

Why are you all mad? Araragi literally cheats on Shinobu with Senjougahara but Shinobu can't do the same?

I'm on the author's side for hating Araragi
I love when people post on english porn sites as if the original creator would ever ever read it

Man, I can't help but feel that you have something against Koyomi, I mean in almost ALL of your monogatari books  the girls cheat on him and became sex slaves of Kaiki or other men's while Araragi is forced to watch it.Give the guy a break!...but nice art work.
Hah, nevermind, art gives me a boner, but the story fucks me over.
I dislike netorares, but isn't this basically just a dif version of araragi?
Fuck this shit. NTR is for losers.
love the art, lost my respect for shinobu :,(   araragi is should be his real man
Fucking neet gets what he deserves
Love the art, hate the story.
